weather.precipitation: Spring showers are common, so it's advisable to pack an umbrella.
weather.what_to_pack: Layered clothing, including a waterproof jacket, comfortable walking shoes, and an umbrella.

tourism.crowds: Moderate tourist density compared to peak summer season.
tourism.costs: Accommodation and attraction prices are generally lower than in summer.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations and popular attractions in advance to secure preferred dates.

highlights.name: Antwerp City Festival
highlights.description: Celebration of local culture with music, food, and arts.
highlights.tips: Arrive early to secure good viewing spots for performances.

highlights.name: Flower Carpet at Grote Markt
highlights.description: Stunning display of flowers arranged in intricate patterns.
highlights.tips: Visit in the morning for the best light for photos.

highlights.name: Easter Markets
highlights.description: Various markets selling traditional Easter decorations and treats.
highlights.tips: Try local delicacies like chocolate eggs and pastries.

highlights.name: Fashion Museum Exhibitions
highlights.description: Showcases of avant-garde and vintage fashion pieces.
highlights.tips: Check the museum schedule for guided tours and special events.

highlights.name: Antwerp Art Weekend
highlights.description: City-wide celebration of contemporary art with exhibitions and events.
highlights.tips: Plan your route in advance to cover multiple galleries.

highlights.name: Scheldt River Cruises
highlights.description: Scenic boat tours along the river offering panoramic views of the city.
highlights.tips: Opt for sunset cruises for a magical experience.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Mild temperatures make cycling enjoyable and allow exploration of the city's bike-friendly paths.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Rent a bike from one of the city's many bike rental shops.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Spring is a great time to see animals enjoying the outdoors in the zoo's lush surroundings.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check feeding times for special animal encounters.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Blooming flowers and greenery make the park a perfect spot for a relaxing outdoor meal.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Bring a blanket and snacks from local markets.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Warmer weather allows for comfortable walks to discover the city's vibrant street art scene.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Join a guided street art tour for in-depth insights.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Spring offers a quieter time to appreciate the historical home and artworks of Peter Paul Rubens.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check for guided tours for a deeper understanding.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Spring sales and new collections make this a great time for shopping in Antwerp's main shopping street.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Look out for boutique stores for unique finds.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy the museum's panoramic views and exhibitions with fewer crowds during Spring.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Climb to the roof for breathtaking city views.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Spring brings fresh produce and outdoor dining options to explore the city's gastronomic scene.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Try local dishes like stoofvlees and Belgian waffles.

not_recommended: Outdoor activities without proper rain gear in case of showers.
Visiting popular tourist sites without pre-booking tickets during peak hours.
